subject: Simsonn VAM Not Detected in Simsonn Manager
description_text:
Hi,

I have plugged in all three VAM units and the power cable but the Simsonn
VAM is not showing up under Simsonn manager, please help with this issue.
Please see attached video

conversations.body_text: Hi Gary Billing,  In the vibration feedback section of SIMSONN Manager 2.0.8, did you see the green "Power Connected" indicator? If it appears green, it means the power is properly connected and the hardware is functioning correctly—you can proceed to test the vibration. Additionally, you can use SIMHUB version 9.9.3 for telemetry control, as it supports over 100 popular games. If you're unsure about the current status, feel free to send us a screenshot of the software interface, and I’ll help you verify the setup.

I made sure to update to SIMSONN Manager 2.0.8 but there is still no green
under power connected, please see attached screenshot, The physical
power adapter itself shows a small green light indicating it has power but
I can only see my pedals in SIMSONN Manager.

[image: image.png]

On Fri, Jul 4, 2025 at 9:21 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Gary Billing,  Please unplug both the USB and power cables. Then, reconnect the USB first, wait a few seconds, and plug in the power cable afterward. Check the software interface to see if the connection is successful.

Hi,

I just tried these steps but it is still showing power disconnected, My
SIMSONN Plus X pedals have a successful connection but the VAM does not.

On Fri, Jul 4, 2025 at 10:13 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Gary Billing,  Please unplug the USB and reconnect only the power cable. Check if the LED inside the control box lights up. Alternatively, you can install the remote support tool Todesk (no registration required). After installation, just provide your ID and temporary code, and I can assist you remotely.

The white LED inside the control box does not light up with the power
cable. It only lights up when I connect the USB. This seems like a hardware
issue rather than software.

On Fri, Jul 4, 2025 at 7:43 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Gary Billing,  Do you have another 24V power supply available? If so, please try testing the device with it. This will help us determine whether the issue is with the power supply or the PlusX control box, so we can arrange a replacement accordingly.

Yes, I tried another 24v power supply and there was no connection
and the white LED did not turn on with the power cable. See attached image.
It seems like the control box power connection is defective.


On Fri, Jul 4, 2025 at 8:15 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Gary Billing,    Sure, please provide your order number, shipping address, and phone number so we can arrange a replacement shipment for you.

Plus X Pedals: Ordered on Amazon - Order #
702-1855324-7980214

VAM: Ordered on AliExpress - Order #
8202099985197602

Shipping address: 26 Scotchmere Crescent, Brampton, ON, Canada. L6P 3A7

Phone number: 647-987-1324

Will I get a tracking number? Thanks for the help.


On Fri, Jul 4, 2025 at 9:43 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi,

Could you please let me know when the new control box has shipped and the
tracking number? Thanks for your help.

Hi Gary Billing,  We’ve already arranged the shipment of the replacement control box. As soon as the tracking number is available, I’ll update you immediately. Please note that it may require transshipment, so the international tracking number might take a bit of time to become available.

Thank you I just had some questions.
1. What is the estimated shipping time to Canada? 2. Is it coming by boat
or plane?
3. Which shipping service was used?

On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 5:52 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Gary Billing,  plane

Ok thanks

On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 7:33 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Gary Billing,  Here is your tracking number: YT2518800706183344. You can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/.

Great, thank you

On Tue, Jul 8, 2025 at 2:47 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi could you please provide me with the sim hub compatible version for the
VAM haptic reactors? Thanks.
Hi Gary Billing, You can download version 9.9.3 directly from the official SIMHUB website. It offers full support for our pedals and vibration motors.

Ok thanks, I will try with that version.

On Wed, Jul 16, 2025 at 2:18 AM service@simsonn.com
